column5: I found this photo of my mother taking aim with her brother.  I can't imagine her ever shooting a gun.
Was that in Canada or England? I know that during Dunkirk a large portion of the British population were being trained to defend the home front

I found this photo of my mother taking aim with her brother.  I can't imagine her ever shooting a gun.  Looks like a Martini .310 Cadet rifle, my old high school had a indoor range that  the cadets would shoot smallbore rifles on . I see Sudbury on the bottom penciled in.
Ah ok. My old high school had a range too
